channel.title: Blogs on Russell Rollins
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Russell Rollins

item.title: Twitter
item.description: The Bird Website One of my goals for the year is to learn to write better. I write technical bits and bobs at work but I’ve never really written for pleasure or for an audience of friends and acquaintances. Part of my plan to learn to write involves Twitter, Twitter is basically a multi-player game where you score points by writing. Seems like good practice. However, my use of Twitter has really dropped off in the past few years.
